verses.verse: Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> secretly <S%H2791><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> out of Shittim <S%H7851><s%> as spies, <S%H7270><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Go, <S%H3212><s%> view <S%H7200><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> including Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>" They went <S%H3212><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H802><s%> of a prostitute <S%H2181><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Rahab, <S%H7343><s%> and slept there. <S%H7901><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> was told, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H559><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in here tonight <S%H3915><s%> to spy out <S%H2658><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>"

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to Rahab, <S%H7343><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Bring out <S%H3318><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> who have come <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H935><s%> who have entered into your house; <S%H1004><s%> for they have come <S%H935><s%> to spy out <S%H2658><s%> all the land. <S%H776><s%>"

The woman <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> and hid <S%H6845><s%> them. <S%H559><s%> Then she said, "Yes, <S%H582><s%> the men came <S%H935><s%> to me, <S%H3045><s%> but I didn't know where they came from. <S%H370><s%>

It happened about the time of the shutting <S%H5462><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> when it was dark, <S%H2822><s%> that the men <S%H582><s%> went out. <S%H3318><s%> Where the men <S%H582><s%> went, <S%H1980><s%> I don't <S%H3045><s%> know. Pursue <S%H7291><s%> them <S%H310><s%> quickly; <S%H4118><s%> for you will overtake them. <S%H5381><s%>"

But she had brought them up <S%H5927><s%> to the roof, <S%H1406><s%> and hid <S%H2934><s%> them with the stalks <S%H6086><s%> of flax, <S%H6593><s%> which she had laid in order <S%H6186><s%> on the roof. <S%H1406><s%>

The men <S%H582><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> them <S%H310><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to the fords: <S%H4569><s%> and as soon as those who pursued <S%H7291><s%> them <S%H310><s%> had gone out, <S%H3318><s%> they shut <S%H5462><s%> the gate. <S%H8179><s%>
Before they had laid down, <S%H7901><s%> she came up <S%H5927><s%> to them on the roof; <S%H1406><s%>

and she said <S%H559><s%> to the men, <S%H582><s%> "I know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the land, <S%H776><s%> and that the fear <S%H367><s%> of you has fallen <S%H5307><s%> on us, <S%H3427><s%> and that all the inhabitants of the land <S%H776><s%> melt <S%H4127><s%> away before you. <S%H6440><s%>

For we have heard <S%H8085><s%> how Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> before you, <S%H6440><s%> when you came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and what you did <S%H6213><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> who were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and to Og, <S%H5747><s%> whom you utterly destroyed. <S%H2763><s%>

As soon as we had heard <S%H8085><s%> it, <S%H3824><s%> our hearts melted, <S%H4549><s%> neither did there remain <S%H6965><s%> any more spirit <S%H7307><s%> in any man, <S%H376><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you: <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh your God, <S%H430><s%> he is God <S%H430><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> and on earth beneath. <S%H776><s%>

Now therefore, <S%H7650><s%> please swear to me by Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> I have dealt <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> with you, <S%H6213><s%> that you also will deal kindly <S%H2617><s%> with my father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> me a true <S%H571><s%> token; <S%H226><s%>

and that you will save alive <S%H2421><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> my mother, <S%H517><s%> my brothers, <S%H251><s%> and my sisters, <S%H269><s%> and all that they have, <S%H5337><s%> and will deliver our lives <S%H5315><s%> from death. <S%H4194><s%>"

The men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H5315><s%> "Our life for yours, <S%H4191><s%> if you don't <S%H5046><s%> talk about this business <S%H1697><s%> of ours; <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be, when Yahweh gives <S%H5414><s%> us the land, <S%H776><s%> that we will deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly with you. <S%H571><s%>"

Then she let them down <S%H3381><s%> by a cord <S%H2256><s%> through <S%H1157><s%> the window; <S%H2474><s%> for her house <S%H1004><s%> was on the side <S%H7023><s%> of the wall, <S%H2346><s%> and she lived <S%H3427><s%> on the wall. <S%H2346><s%>

She said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3212><s%> "Go to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> lest the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> find <S%H6293><s%> you; <S%H2247><s%> and hide yourselves there three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> have returned. <S%H7725><s%> Afterward, <S%H310><s%> you may go <S%H3212><s%> your way. <S%H1870><s%>"
The men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H5355><s%> "We will be guiltless of this your oath <S%H7621><s%> which you have made us to swear. <S%H7650><s%>

Behold, <S%H935><s%> when we come into the land, <S%H776><s%> you shall bind <S%H7194><s%> this line <S%H8615><s%> of scarlet <S%H8144><s%> thread <S%H2339><s%> in the window <S%H2474><s%> which <S%H3381><s%> you used to let us down. <S%H622><s%> You shall gather to yourself into the house <S%H1004><s%> your father, <S%H1><s%> your mother, <S%H517><s%> your brothers, <S%H251><s%> and all your father <S%H1><s%>'s household. <S%H1004><s%>

It shall be that whoever <S%H834><s%> goes out <S%H3318><s%> of the doors <S%H1817><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%> into the street, <S%H2351><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> will be on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and we will be guiltless. <S%H5355><s%> Whoever is with you in the house, <S%H1004><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on our head, <S%H7218><s%> if any hand is on him. <S%H3027><s%>
But if you talk <S%H5046><s%> about this business <S%H1697><s%> of ours, <S%H5355><s%> then we shall be guiltless of your oath <S%H7621><s%> which you have made us to swear. <S%H7650><s%>"

She said, <S%H559><s%> "According to your words, <S%H1697><s%> so be it. <S%H7971><s%>" She sent them away, and they departed. <S%H3212><s%> She tied <S%H7194><s%> the scarlet <S%H8144><s%> line <S%H8615><s%> in the window. <S%H2474><s%>

They went, <S%H3212><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> there three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> had returned. <S%H7725><s%> The pursuers <S%H7291><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> them throughout all the way, <S%H1870><s%> but didn't <S%H4672><s%> find them.

Then the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> passed over, <S%H5674><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun; <S%H5126><s%> and they told <S%H5608><s%> him all that had happened to them. <S%H4672><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Truly <S%H3588><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hands <S%H3027><s%> all the land. <S%H776><s%> Moreover, <S%H3427><s%> all the inhabitants of the land <S%H776><s%> melt <S%H4127><s%> away before us. <S%H6440><s%>"
